description: Searchable registry of fixes with reproducible steps. Add entries via /checkpoint or manually.

fixes.title: WiFi Latency Spikes (311ms max)
fixes.symptom: WiFi latency spikes every ~11 seconds, 311ms max latency, 17ms average
fixes.root_cause: Channel 161 conflict with neighbor network at -41 dBm signal strength

solution.summary: Changed WiFi channels to avoid interference
steps: Identified Mac was connected to Netgear AP 'Wifi672 5G', not Xfinity gateway
Changed Netgear 5GHz channel from 161 to 36 (UNII-1 band)
Changed Xfinity gateway 5GHz channel to 149 (UNII-3 band) to avoid self-interference
Verified latency dropped to 4ms avg / 8ms max

fixes.verification: ping test shows <10ms max latency, no spikes

fixes.title: 2am LaunchAgent Backup Failing (Exit Code 78)
fixes.symptom: 2am backup LaunchAgent never successfully ran, exit code 78
fixes.root_cause: SMB share not mounted at 2am when Mac is sleeping, script exits immediately

solution.summary: Added SMB mount retry logic with 5 attempts and 30s delays
steps: Added is_share_accessible() function to check if backup dir exists
Added attempt_mount() function to open SMB URL
Added retry loop with MAX_MOUNT_RETRIES=5 and MOUNT_RETRY_DELAY=30
Configured Mac mini power settings to prevent sleep
commands: launchctl list | grep vibeboard  # Check if LaunchAgent is loaded

fixes.verification: Manual run of backup script succeeds, logs show retry logic working
